name: You Shall Not Install
description:
What would you do if you were an antivirus program ? Beat everyone with lasers of course... You Shall Not instal is a top-down shooter with tower defence elements.

*This is a demo version of the game with 10 levels*



Keyboard + Mouse Controls

Arrow Keys — Move
Mouse Movement — Rotate the player
MouseLeft Button — Fire

Xbox Gamepad Controls

D-Pad/Left Stick — Move
D-Pad/Right Stick — Rotate the player
LB,LT,RB,RT — Fire


Credits

Leon Walras ( @LeonDevLogs ) — Developer

Felipe Marx ( @FelipeMarx ) — Music
